reviewText: I saw this at 13 years old, it was great seeing it again and showing my kids
Great movie, shows how people are really hurting and really looking for help. I saw it some years ago and got it for some others that hadn't seen it.

I saw this in the theater in the late 1960s when I was 8 years old.  It was shocking then with a great message.  It's message is still current for today.  It features a very young Eric Estrada as Nicky Cruz.  Pat Boone makes a convincing David Wilkerson.  A classic Christian movie.
